name: Gardening Plus
description: Designed to place an order, manage an order, make payment, update profile data and give a review for a customer. Here also have nice dashboard with user and admin panel.
feature1: Clients can order for wholesale quantity on this website, they can cancel their order before making payment.
feature2: This website has dashboard to manage my orders and add a review tab for clients.
feature3: This website dashboard also has to manage all necessary things like manage orders, make admin, and manage products for admin.
feature4: If any review & product is added from dashboard then it will automatically show in the home page.
feature5: In the manage product section, an admin can add or delete any product.
feature6: Anyone can update their profile information from my profile section in the database.

name: NextGen Bike
description: Designed to inventory products like add product, stock update, delete a product, etc. If any product is added or updated status then it will automatically update to the home page.
feature1: NextGen Bike is mainly warehouse management website
feature2: You can do inventory of your product
feature3: You can add any new product by using add new item button and it will display on website.
feature4: You can manage your product. If you want you can delete also.
feature5: Make some route protected only login user can access this after email verification
feature6: Also add banner, product feature and contact us section.

name: Zenith estates
description: Developed firebase login system here. Also, add Facebook and Google login system. Designed to sell apartments.
feature2: Also, add Facebook and Google login system.
feature4: Also, have a banner and testimonial section.
feature5: After clicking the buy now button customer will redirect to the purchase page.
